summary: THE SEARCH FOR FREEDOM is the story of a cultural revolution fueled by the human desire to live in the moment and do what makes you feel the most alive.
cast: Annie Boulanger|Bruce Brown|Yvon Chouinard|Gary Fisher|Tony Hawk|Nyjah Huston|Jeremy Jones|Ron Kauk|Logan Laplante|Kai Lenny|Robbie Maddison|Warren Miller|Kelia Moniz|Robby Naish|Meg Roh|Tom Schaar|Glenn Singleman|Kelly Slater|Danny Way
title: The Search for Freedom
